summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 TOYOTA COROLLA. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V006000 (AIR BAGS); FRONTAL PASSENGER AIR BAG INFLATOR HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. IN ADDITION, THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE AIR BAG WARNING LIGHT WAS ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO LOCAL DEALER TOYOTA OF HOLLYWOOD, FL LOCATED ON 1450 N STATE RD 7, HOLLYWOOD, FL, 33021, WHERE SHE WAS INFORMED PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE AND THAT SHE WOULD BE CONTACTED WHEN THEY WERE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
